title: The Millstream
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A family-run public house where customers are warmly welcomed. Has large country garden and a restaurant. Offers a few vegan choices such as fresh salads, roasted vegetables, chips, jacket potatoes and roasted potatoes. Uses locally sourced produce when possible. Advance bookings are highly recommended, especially on weekends; however, walk-ins are welcome and will be seated as best as possible. Pet-friendly, but are not permitted in the restaurant area.
